insights.populationGrowth: Moderate growth at 1.2% annually driven by industrial employment opportunities. Second-largest city after Ulaanbaatar attracts rural migrants.
insights.educationLevel: High education levels with 91% literacy. Technical education institutions support industrial workforce development.
insights.employmentPattern: Manufacturing/industry 45%, services 25%, agriculture 15%, construction 10%, government 5%. Strong industrial employment base.
insights.housingPattern: Apartment buildings 60%, individual houses 30%, ger districts 10%. Most urbanized province with modern housing predominating.

insights.temperature: Continental climate with cold winters (-25째C) and warm summers (25째C). Urban heat island effect moderates extreme temperatures slightly.
insights.precipitation: Annual precipitation 280mm with summer concentration. Urban infrastructure handles precipitation better than rural areas.
insights.seasonality: Cold winter (November-March), mild spring (April-May), warm summer (June-August), pleasant autumn (September-October). Urban environment moderates extremes.
insights.extremeEvents: Occasional dzud effects on surrounding rural areas, urban flooding during heavy rains, air pollution episodes during winter heating season.
